name: pdp_set_quantity_add_to_cart
description: Open a specific product detail page, set the desired quantity, and click Add to Cart using deterministic element references. PRECONDITION: Can be called from any page but product URL must be valid. Successful outcome: Desired quantity of product is added to cart.

steps.description: Open the product detail page for product URL.
Enter the desired quantity into the Qty input field.
Click the Add to Cart button to add the product to the cart.
Wait for the cart update confirmation to ensure the product is successfully added.
